This is the first Guinea Pig film from Japan and this is the sickest, in my opinion. A bunch of guys torture a girl for several days before eventually stabbing her in the gut when she lashes out, but they bury her this time, unlike the others who have been burnt and placed in vials and seen cleaning the place. The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with a mass amount of fossilized bone and difficult terrain. The crew immediately believe there is something amiss as they exit the cars and enter the desert. This is a very straight foward movie and hard to review without spoilers.
